author: Perez Hilton
title: Chelsea Clinton DRAGGING Donald Trump On Twitter Gives Us So Much Life!!
text:
2/07/2017 5:58 PM ET | Filed under: Politik • Donald Trump • Hillary Clinton • Bill Clinton • Twitter • Controversy • Girl Power • Shade • Social Issues 
Yasss, Chelsea Clinton , yasss! 
Hillary and Bill Clinton 's daughter's once very tame Twitter account has now become a source for some of the BEST anti- Donald Trump tweets… and we are SO here for it! 
Hit him where it hurts, bb! 
From commenting on the Women's March on Washington, Drumpf's un-American immigration ban, and his horrific National Prayer Breakfast speech, Miz Clinton's claws are OUT! 
Ch-ch-check out the 36-year-old's BEST tweets calling out our newly-elected POTUS (below)!!
